Recommendations: Add a **Summary or Objective** section to highlight your key qualifications and career goals at the beginning of your resume, this will immediately grab the attention of recruiters.

Quantify your achievements whenever possible by including **specific numbers and metrics** to demonstrate the impact you made in previous roles; for example, 'Increased sales by 30% in Q2' is much more impactful than 'Improved sales'.
Consider adding a **Projects section** to showcase personal or academic projects where you applied your skills, this helps demonstrate practical experience beyond professional roles.

Tailor your resume to each specific job application by **highlighting the skills and experiences** that are most relevant to the job description, which will ensure that the ATS recognizes the alignment.
Ensure that the information in the **contact details** sections are accurate and professional; verify the email address and LinkedIn profile link are correct.
While two pages is acceptable, ensure all information is highly relevant. Consider condensing information to **maintain a one or two-page** resume.
The resume has many strong points, but a more modern template might improve its appeal. Try to use **modern resume templates**.

RESUME_TIPS: In your work experience, highlight your experience with **inventory planning** and **demand forecasting**. Quantify how your forecasting skills improved **forecast accuracy** or reduced **stock outs**, providing specific metrics.

Expand on your data specialist role at JATO Dynamics to show experience in **replenishment** strategies. Mention any experience defining **min/max levels** or implementing **replenishment rules** for different products.
Within the Axis Bank section, explain how your analysis of KPIs such as **inventory turnover ratio** contributed to inventory optimization. Provide specifics on how **inventory turnover** improved.
Mention your experience with **ABC classification** or **EOQ** (Economic Order Quantity) under the skills section. Explain how these methodologies improved **inventory efficiency** or reduced costs.

Specify any experience with **omnichannel inventory** management (retail + online/marketplaces) from your time at JATO Dynamics or Preqin, if applicable. Detail how you balanced inventory across different channels.

If you've worked with any specific retail inventory planning tools or ERP systems like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, explicitly mention them in the Skills section. Detail how these tools aided **inventory planning**.

In your Data Specialist role, quantify how your Power BI dashboards provided insights into **store performance**, **forecast accuracy**, or **inventory health**, detailing how these insights improved decision-making.
Within the Paksha context, add examples of how you have identified and proposed actions for **slow-moving** and **overstocked items**. Include metrics that show improvements made.

Detail your experience with **allocation** strategies, explaining how you allocate stock for new launches, reorders, and high-performing SKUs in previous roles. Quantify any impact this strategy had on **store fill rates**.

Incorporate metrics related to **stock movement** and **store fill rate** in your experience descriptions. Explain how you monitored **stock movement** to ensure optimal inventory levels and improved fill rates by a certain percentage.

Inventory Planning.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management: How to Optimize Your Inventory
Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn inventory planning techniques and strategies to optimize stock levels and reduce costs.
Explore advanced inventory optimization strategies using data analytics and forecasting techniques.
Understand the basics of inventory management and different inventory control methods.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Master demand forecasting techniques to accurately predict future demand and improve planning.
Learn how to apply forecasting methods to improve inventory turnover and reduce costs.
An introduction to the basics of Time Series Analysis and Forecasting

Replenishment.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to calculate order quantity for inventory replenishment based on demand.
How to use min max quantity as control limits to generate replenishment orders.
Understand the basics of Inventory Management and Control

Allocation.DESCRIPTION: Learn to analyze past sales data and allocate product in each store by region.
Discover how to use inventory planning strategies in store in store allocation and demand.
Understand how to allocate demand to different points of supply, also known as cross-docking.

Inventory Optimization.DESCRIPTION: Optimize inventory management for maximum efficiency and cost savings.
Learn advanced techniques for optimizing supply chain processes, including inventory.
Understand the basic of inventory management strategies and cost savings.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to categorize your inventory using ABC analysis for better control.
Learn ABC classification for effective inventory management and cost reduction.

ABC classification.COURSE_NAME: What is ABC analysis in Inventory Management?
ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Understand how to classify and manage products by importance.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: How to find the EOQ formula and reduce the cost with an optimal value.
Learn the EOQ formula for efficient inventory planning.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to implement your inventory modules in NetSuite ERP.
Learn how to implement NetSuite warehouse features.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Complete tutorial on how to use Zoho Inventory.

Zoho.COURSE_NAME: Zoho Inventory: Setting up and Managing
Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Discover how to configure and use Zoho to manage your products.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to implement the all in one commerce platform to support order, logistics and warehouse management.
Discover how to use Unicommerce to run order managment, shipping operations and logistics.
